sn35.144:3.1: 144. Bāhiradukkhahetusutta
sn35.144:4.2: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo rūpānaṃ uppādāya, sopi dukkho.
sn35.144:4.3: Dukkhasambhūtā, bhikkhave, rūpā kuto sukhā bhavissanti.
sn35.144:4.9: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo dhammānaṃ uppādāya, sopi dukkho.
sn35.144:4.10: Dukkhasambhūtā, bhikkhave, dhammā kuto sukhā bhavissanti.
